casebody.data:
Morgan L. Livingston, and Another, Respondents v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from a judgment in favor of plaintiffs, entered on the report of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Herbert Barry of counsel, for appellants. Olin, Rives & Montgomery, attorneys, and George L. Rives of counsel, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro, and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on opinion in Livingston v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Co., ante page. 389
